div.span: Provider Engagement Executive - Clinical Experience - St. Louis, MO

font.font: Role:
Provider Engagement Executive
Assignment:
Retail Management
Location:
St. Louis, MO

Humana needs your skills to help us tell a compelling story about healthcare today with our Primary Care Providers across all lines of business. You will be the defined point of contact for PCPs and responsible for the financial performance of PCPs and IDSes. You will be successful by creating strategic partnerships with providers to improve health efficacy and efficiency and manage provider groups to collective quality and P&L results and goals. We’re looking for driven, innovative people who are interested in using their data-mining and analytical skills to help our providers and ultimately our members to achieve lifelong well-being and help Humana make lasting, positive changes in the healthcare industry.
Assignment Capsule

Be a part of the Market Operations world as a Provider Engagement Executive, PEX – Create strategic provider partnerships with large, engaged providers to improve their experience with Humana. You will manage provider groups to enhance quality and P&L results and goals. Be a strong partner and build relationships with internal stakeholders to create a seamless experience for the provider.
In this role you will:

font.font: Bachelor's Degree
Additional Information

At Humana, we know your well-being is important to you, and it’s important to us too. That’s why we’re committed to making resources available to you that will enable you to become happier, healthier, and more productive in all areas of your life. If you share our passion for helping people, we likely have the right place for you at Humana.

div.span: Humana Inc., headquartered in Louisville, KY, is a leading health care company that offers a wide range of insurance products and health and wellness services that incorporate an integrated approach to lifelong well-being. By leveraging the strengths of its core businesses, Humana believes it can better explore opportunities for existing and emerging adjacencies in health care that can further enhance wellness opportunities for the millions of people across the nation with whom the company has relationships.
